Question: In one of his writings, this person claims to have gone to the sea at the age of 10.
Hints: On 13 January 1493, this person made his last stop in the New World.
This person was born before 31 October 1451 in Genoa, part of modern Italy.
On 1 October 1500, this person and his two brothers, likewise in chains, were sent back to Spain.
